title: SkinSpotlight Camera tool help
body: Hello so i enjoy editing, and was told to use the skinspotlight replay/camera tool, the replay works fine and i can obtain the replays but the problem lies with the camera. i want to do some profesional editing with camera angles but i cant change the pov (etc. peacepigeon's videos). The program opens but when it does the scan where all list should appear green i have a couple red and have no clue how to unlock it, and cant help but think that may be the reason why i cant change camera angles. Any information will help ty
